long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You want to record and replay your web app requests but don't want to modify your production code base nor want to maintain a separate build process for production and lower environments? No worries, we have a chrome extension that allows you to inject your bsv config after your app is loaded but before it's executed (e.g., for angularjs, after angular context is created but before your main controller has ran).
